fields.title: Lake Tahoe Water Adventure a Kayak Rental for Two
fields.fine_print: One deal per person. Multiple may be purchased as gifts. Valid from June to September 18, 2011. Reservations required; subject to availability. Not valid on holidays or Saturdays. No extensions. 48-hour cancellation policy.
fields.details:
- Kayak the crystal clear waters of Lake Tahoe with this rental.
- Bring a date or best friend and get cozy in a kayak a deux.
- Pack a lunch & stop to relax on the beach in between strokes.
- Enjoy two single kayaks or snuggle into a romantic double.
- Kayaking's a way to get back to nature while sculpting those delts.
- Enjoy two single kayaks or snuggle into a romantic double.
